Player History
Drafted in 25th round, 398th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/9/2015, off Scott McDaniel (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2015, off Bill Brennan (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/24/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $3,530,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/24/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Chicago on 5/17/2019.
